item.title: Determinants of ground transport modal choice in long-distance trips in Spain
item.description: Abstract In transport economics, modeling modal choice is a fundamental key for policy makers try-ing to improve the sustainability of transportation systems.

item.title: The spatial productivity of transportation infrastructure
item.description: Abstract Transportation infrastructure services may cause an impact on the economy of the region in which they are located and, additionally, they are likely to have an impact on other regions.
